string-array.item: Install tool: sudo aptitude install mtpfs libfuse-dev libmad0-dev
Confirm user group permissions in the current fuse user group
Access mounted device: mtpfs /media/mtp via file explorer; same as local directory
"Uninstall device: fusermount -u /media/mtp Note: Only for Ubuntu 8.04!"
